gameDetails.description:
This brave company composes an entire MERCENARY GROUP (meaning they will work for any faction) featuring three Kickstarter Exclusive Swashbucklers, one Kickstarter Exclusive Brute, and one Kickstarter Exclusive Quartermaster.

Heroes:
Quartermaster: Milady de Winter, Swashbuckler: Athorc, Swashbuckler: Orcamis, Brute: Porcos, Swashbuckler: Gob'lingnan
